data.expected_result: Show profile of user playing Constructor.
data.short_description: Game Detection for Constructor causes viewers who click on the user playing the specified game to crash.
data.steps_to_repro: - Load up Constructor on Steam with Game Detection on. - Have another user click on the person playing Constructor to view their profile. -
